descriptions:
BRENNAN
"Your grandfather, Aetheon."

BRENNAN
"Well, it was. It still is,
"but he was the servant of the sun."

BRENNAN
"When I was a young girl,
"Aetheon,
"without the god of the sun, he went feral.
"He'd lost his connection to his maker."

BRENNAN
"When I found Aetheon,
"I knew that he shouldn't fall into the wrong hands
"and I knew that he
"would still want
"for the Light to shine."

BRENNAN
"You are the grandson of a celestial.
"You do not get your powers
"from your devotion to poetry.
"You get them because of the blood
"that runs in your veins."

BRENNAN
You enter and see the Lady Aranessa Royce,
who you saw yesterday at the funeral.

BRENNAN
"I'm Lady Aranessa Royce.
"Welcome to the Palazzo Davinos.
"This is the house of my vassal, Lord Raimond."

BRENNAN
"My family has a castle in the Golden Orchard
"halfway between our world and Faerie and it is dying."

BRENNAN
As you've been marching--
MARISHA
Azune!

However, looking around you do see
a dwarven wizard turn the corner, and Murray,
you look up and see Azune in front of you.

you see that he has what looks to be a twin brother
who is wearing a golden, shimmering long wig,
a ruff as well.
You see, he looks over and says,
"My brother Calastro Mercanaud,"
and you see that the brother says,
"Charmed. Some sherry for the guest,"

Walking up the stairs,
you see that there is a dull red glow
and this powdered white,
rough, silk shirt wearing guy
walks up and you see that there is a light casting,
a red fiery light casting behind him
that vanishes as he puts his wig on.
As he walks into the room, you see that he's sweating.
His silk shirt is drenched.
He has a pair of shears in each hand.

BRENNAN
"bear the symbol of the Candescent Creed,"

TRAVIS
If you find yourself in need of business
with the Candescent Creed,
I have recently allied myself with them.

You look and see Teor traveling
with a small satchel of coin
with the Candescent Creed's symbol on it,

WHITNEY
-- brought me to you
to spread the word of the Candescent Creed.

BRENNAN
"If you can't be an empire,
"you take your licks,
"you pick yourself up, you dust yourself off,
"and you start a church or a merchant company, something."

BRENNAN
"The Creed is--"
SAM
All right.
BRENNAN
"-- exactly what we need it to be."

BRENNAN
"Casimir's gone.
"Casimir's gone."

BRENNAN
"Cas has been on the gibbet for a moment.
"That's our list
"of people who have owed money for long enough
"that they're not going to survive the next new moon.

BRENNAN
"Cas had his own crew,
"four or five Crow Keepers that were loyal to him.

BRENNAN
"Cas came in here yesterday
"and settled his debts in full.

BRENNAN
"He owed more money than--
"You can't let people walk around owing you
"that amount of money, but we were understanding.

BRENNAN
"He came in yesterday.
"Him and his crew had new gear.
"He dropped a sack of money on the bar,
"paid off his whole debt, and he had a deed of title to
"a stronghouse in Gormalay.
"He said he was getting out of town.

Thimble,
this is The Guard Tower.
It is the home base of the Crow Keepers.

you see about 10 feet in front of you is Solomon,
who's one of the guildmasters of the Crow Keepers.

I don't want to get in a fight with the entire Crow Keepers.
It doesn't seem like a smart move in this moment.

BRENNAN
"You'll have no trouble from the Crow Keepers.
"But he's gone,

BRENNAN
"These are people whose character
"falls beneath the standard of a thieves' guild.

BRENNAN
"it wasn't a Crow Keeper, but he knew someone,

LAURA
Cyd.

BRENNAN
"Cyd barged in, started shouting at him.
"Cyd had worked up a lather, his fur was matted.

"I know he drives wagons
"for the Revolutionary Council up there.

TRAVIS
Well, I came looking for
information for my brother, Cyd.

BRENNAN
the Ogrimok Marketplace has some of the finest weapons dealers
and armorers in all the world.

BRENNAN
At the very bottom of the cascading falls of Dol-Makjar
where the River Vrosh lets out
into Lake Nahami,

BRENNAN
we see here at the base, the tall spires of Dol-Makjar,
this city that was the shield of Kahad
during long centuries that stood as the shields
to the orcish homeland against the mountain dwarves
to their east, to the humans to their north,
at a time ruled by the Shapers.

BRENNAN
Now it beholds a metropolis,
a place where all peoples united in revolution
and rebellion against the gods,
can sing and trade, dance and perform magic.

BRENNAN
Gazing at you and Dean Tallbarrel.

BRENNAN
"Ellipides, I am given to understand
"that until the stroke of six this evening,
"you are Dean of this institution, are you not?"

BRENNAN
Dean Tallbarrel
has fundamentally betrayed you.

BRENNAN
In the midst you see here,
your brother Ethrand
casting a Silence spell,
holding in his hand
a perfectly spherical black stone,
wings surrounding it.

BRENNAN
"I was a kid when the Falconer's Rebellion ended,
"let alone the Shapers' War.

as you see Inez,
herself a veteran of the Falconer's Rebellion, looks up to you.

LUIS
I will start to recite the names
of those that fought alongside us
in the Falconers' Rebellion that did not make it through,
and I will keep that going as they ride off.

SAM
I'm sorry, the Filament is--
is that creature's blood?
BRENNAN
(Yanessa) "No, no, no, Wicky."

BRENNAN
"It ain't got blood.
"It is Light, you know,
"but it's in his body, yeah,
"but it's also his spit. You know, it's hard to say.
"It is Light. It's just,
"it's just what he's made of, innit?"

SAM
We've been drinking this from the Radiant Chalice.
We've been tattooing it on my body.
BRENNAN "The Filament, "we don't know that it's not condensed Light from the cosmos. "We just have a place that we get it from."

BRENNAN
this massive knight walks in,
heavily-armored, gray-bearded, human knight.
He's got gleaming luminous tattoos
all around his neck that curl up around over his eyes.

BRENNAN
"I am Sir Filoneus Halovar.
"These are my dogs, Wrath and Judgment."

BRENNAN
"And that was your father, Godard,
"and Godard has always had a gift."

BRENNAN
You see your father has this blindfold on again
and you look at that enormous, top-heavy
protrusion in his back,
and he turns and goes,
"Mother,
"might I?" She says, "Yes, darling."

BRENNAN
and as he releases it,
you see these two stunted naked wings
extend from his back "(grunts)"
and immediately grow luminous, beautiful feathers.
White eagle's wings.

"He dropped a sack of money on the bar,

I catch Thimble by the door

Find him
for our brother.
And take a Bardic Inspiration with you as you leave.

Teor, you look down and see the symbol,
subtle, but on the belt of House Davinos,

"This is the house of my vassal, Lord Raimond."

here in the banquet hall of the Villa Aurora,

The Tachonis the Priestly Family of Shadow,
of the journey through night to the next day.

you recognize him as a former companion of Thjazi's.

and that foolishness starts to fade away

it looks like
a half of a mask

and you begin to look at a sword

(gasps)

you see that little dead fox
